description: WWE 2K is a series of pro wrestling video games. A new entry in the series is released each year. Yuke's developed WWE 2K14 to WWE 2K19.

Some WWE 2K games developed by Yuke's contain animations saved as YANM files. The games use these files to animate wrestlers' entrances, taunts, moves, and other actions. YANM files contain YMAM files, which define the facial expressions associated with an animation.
